wikipedia_page.main: Keith Reginald Littler (born 26 March 1961 in Ely, Cambridgeshire) is an English author, writer, composer and producer best known for his work on several children's programmes.

response: The Bopps are a children's musical group formed in the south west of England in 2010. Their members are Stan Cullimore, Keith Littler, Mike Cross and Joanna Ruiz.

Keith Littler has run a successful pre-school television production company - The Little Entertainment Group  for many years. Amongst his works are Little Red Tractor which is broadcast in the UK by BBC, TV drama Roman Mysteries BBC and Merlin the Magical Puppy (cITV).
